name: sett
content:
sett noun [C]
(FOR ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hole in the ground, often with several passages and different entrances, where a badger or a family of badgers lives: a badger sett
Coatesy/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

sett noun [C]
(PIECE OF STONE)
a small piece of stone that is used with others to make paths, etc.: We recommend granite setts for driveways and larger paved areas.
